last_episode_to_air.name: Trust
last_episode_to_air.overview: As the battle for Alpha Centauri unfolds, the Robinsons and their friends risk everything to restore peace and pave the way for a better future.

name: Lost in Space
overview: After crash-landing on an alien planet, the Robinson family fights against all odds to survive and escape. But they're surrounded by hidden dangers.

seasons.name: Season 1
seasons.overview: After crash-landing on an alien planet, the Robinson family fights against all odds to survive and escape. But they're surrounded by hidden dangers.

seasons.name: Season 2
seasons.overview: Now stranded even deeper in space, the Robinsons band together to explore strange planets, face down new dangers and find their beloved Robot.

seasons.name: Season 3
seasons.overview: In an epic final season, the Robinsons' survival instincts kick into hyperdrive as they race to reunite and protect Alpha Centauri from a robot invasion.

episodes.name: Impact
episodes.overview: On the way to a space colony, a crisis sends the Robinsons hurtling towards an unfamiliar planet, where they struggle to survive a harrowing night.

episodes.name: Diamonds in the Sky
episodes.overview: Another crash brings more travellers to the planet as the Robinsons work to salvage their ship with help from their mysterious new companion.

episodes.name: Infestation
episodes.overview: Flashbacks reveal clues to Dr. Smith's past. The Robinsons contend with a new threat as the ship's fuel supply starts dropping -- fast.

episodes.name: The Robinsons Were Here
episodes.overview: The Robinsons make contact with another family of survivors, and Will races to protect his family after Judy learns what happened aboard the Resolute.

episodes.name: Transmission
episodes.overview: As the team builds a tower to signal the Resolute, Maureen investigates a planetary anomaly, and Will braces for a tough conversation with his dad.

episodes.name: Eulogy
episodes.overview: Maureen debates whether to share what she saw in the sky, Don leads a mission to find fuel, and the robot's presence stokes tensions within the group.

episodes.name: Pressurized
episodes.overview: While Dr. Smith moves ahead with his secret project, seismic activity wreaks havoc across the planet and leaves two teams facing impossible choices.

episodes.name: Trajectory
episodes.overview: Maureen finds a solution to the fuel issue, but putting her plan into action proves trickier than expected. Dr. Smith realises her cover is blown.

episodes.name: Resurrection
episodes.overview: Judy sets out to find Maureen, while Will and Penny lead an expedition to the caves. Dr. Smith pursues a new escape plan.

episodes.name: Danger, Will Robinson
episodes.overview: As the clock ticks down toward the Resolute's departure, the Robinsons scramble to get off the planet -- and out from under Dr. Smith's thumb.

1.name: Season 1
1.overview: After crash-landing on an alien planet, the Robinson family fights against all odds to survive and escape. But they're surrounded by hidden dangers.

episodes.name: Shipwrecked
episodes.overview: Seven months later, marooned on a watery planet, the Robinsons make a risky bid to power up their Jupiter, and Will vows to track down the Robot.

episodes.name: Precipice
episodes.overview: Penny and Maureen become trapped in a mysterious metal trench, and Don falls prey to a nasty toxin.

episodes.name: Echoes
episodes.overview: The Robinsons' dreams of a happy reunion fade when they realize something's very wrong aboard the Resolute. Smith seizes a chance to clear her name.

episodes.name: Scarecrow
episodes.overview: While Will searches for clues to the Robot's fate, John and Judy travel to the dusty surface of the nearby planet to help their fellow survivors.

episodes.name: Run
episodes.overview: John's predicament goes from bad to worse, sending Judy on a frantic race across the planet. Penny spies on Smith -- with help from an old friend.

episodes.name: Severed
episodes.overview: The fast-spreading contaminant leaves Penny, Smith and friends stranded in tight quarters. Will and Maureen set out with Adler to find the Robot.

episodes.name: Evolution
episodes.overview: John recruits an unlikely partner to help hunt down a secret audio signal intercepted by the ship. Will begins to suspect Adler is hiding something.

episodes.name: Unknown
episodes.overview: While Maureen leads a mutiny, Hastings visits John to deliver an ultimatum, and Penny tries to convince Will that his Robot has changed.

episodes.name: Shell Game
episodes.overview: Will and Penny scramble to hide the robots and figure out their next move. Meanwhile, Hastings amps up his war against the Robinsons.

episodes.name: Ninety-Seven
episodes.overview: The mission to save Scarecrow takes an unexpected turn, throwing the Resolute into chaos. Judy hatches a plan to get a ship to Alpha Centauri.

2.name: Season 2
2.overview: Now stranded even deeper in space, the Robinsons band together to explore strange planets, face down new dangers and find their beloved Robot.

episodes.name: Three Little Birds
episodes.overview: A year into their mission with the children of the Resolute, Judy, Penny and Will scramble to find the titanium they need to get to Alpha Centauri.

episodes.name: Contact
episodes.overview: While Judy sets out to find Grant Kelly, Penny and Will explore a mysterious tunnel. Light years away, Maureen, John and Don hunt for SAR's remains.

episodes.name: The New Guy
episodes.overview: Scarecrow helps Maureen and John plot an engine heist. Judy returns to camp with new passengers. Will makes a startling discovery in the alien city.

episodes.name: Nothing Left Behind
episodes.overview: As the adults race to destroy all clues to the location of Alpha Centauri, the Robinson kids receive an ominous message from SAR.

episodes.name: Stuck
episodes.overview: After crashing on a boggy planet, Maureen and Judy contend with a massive salivating creature, while John and Penny work to free the trapped Robot.

episodes.name: Final Transmission
episodes.overview: The story of Don's run-in with SAR leads the Robinsons to an alarming realization. Will sneaks out on a dangerous solo mission.

episodes.name: Contingencies on Contingencies
episodes.overview: The Robinsons race to get help for Will, warn the other colonists and activate a secret defense system. Vijay tags along with Penny on a risky outing.

episodes.name: Trust
episodes.overview: As the battle for Alpha Centauri unfolds, the Robinsons and their friends risk everything to restore peace and pave the way for a better future.

3.name: Season 3
3.overview: In an epic final season, the Robinsons' survival instincts kick into hyperdrive as they race to reunite and protect Alpha Centauri from a robot invasion.
